name: Austin James
coverLetter: Currently an Assistant Store Manager For a Verizon retailer. Looking for something knew. I've trimmed For countless friends countless times, and consider myself very good. I have a great eye for detail and can move very quickly and accurately.  I've never trimmed as a profession before but would love to start. I can work any time, any day of the week. Please consider me for employment. You'll be glad you did!
